name: Karpos - any way home
description:
Introduction

This odd looking purple guy is called Karpos and he is trying to get home. The green doors are your way,

Controls

Menu - Keyboard Escape

Left - Keyboard A /Keyboard left arrow/Left controller stick

Right- Keyboard D /Keyboard right arrow/Right controller stick

Jump - Keyboard spacebar/Right button controller

Shoot - Keyboard enter/Left mouse button/Bottom button controller

Development

This is my second  published game done using Unity. A bit of a jam imposed by myself for the long public holiday here we have in the UK. It took me 2-3 days ish to get to this point. I am not sure I will do much more with this game but it was a fun little project.  The main addition here from my last game (smashy) was the destructible tile maps and a lot more particle effects. I have also added some tutorial elements which was quite time consuming.  I also spent quite a bit of time learning how to add bones to 2d sprites which was interesting. The character here is very small but it is still rigged up to do a lot more.
